prod_short_desc: Catch the crook before he escapes with the loot!
prod_long_desc:
Pick up your badge and join the LEGO® City Mountain Police officer on an Off-Road Chase to help stop the crook! This fun building toy set features a crook’s hideout with space for loot and greenery and a police motocross bike with off-road tires and kickstand. Includes 2 minifigures and a snake figure.
Includes 2 minifigures: a police officer and crook, plus a snake figure.
Features a crook hideout with greenery and space for loot.
Also includes a police motocross bike with kickstand and off-road tires.
Wedge the crowbar into the hole in the hideout to recover the jewels.
Accessory elements include 2 jewel elements, a crowbar and handcuffs.
This fun building toy set is suitable for ages 5-12.
Motocross bike measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide.
Hideout measures over 1” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
